biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" by his peers, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Hirsala Golf with distinction. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Jarkko's dedication is evident in every swing.

With 8 past appearances, Jarkko's experience is undeniable, making him a formidable competitor. His crowning achievement came when he seized the coveted Hector Trophée, a testament to his skill and composure under pressure. In addition to his team success, Jarkko has also demonstrated his individual prowess by capturing the Victor Trophy.

As he prepares for his ninth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Jarkko remains a player to watch. His blend of experience and unwavering focus makes him a perennial contender for both the team and individual titles.
